title: Merregon Halberd
content:
Merregon Halberd Uncommon 2~11 Damage 1d10 +1 Slashing Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Sharp teeth grow out of the halberd's dark metal - if it is indeed metal at all Halberd Two-Handed Extra Reach 2.7 85

1d10 +1 Slashing

Weapon Enchantment +1

Sharp teeth grow out of the halberd's dark metal - if it is indeed metal at all
